pullrequest.title: add support for 'stopCmd' and 'logsCmd' in simulations, and other changes

content.raw:
I think we were looking for a https solution in the sim instances for some time without much luck. 

Having a UI on the sim instance is an interesting idea. How would that affect user experience? i.e. sending users to a separate tab per round.
content.html:
I think we were looking for a https solution in the sim instances for some time without much luck.

Having a UI on the sim instance is an interesting idea. How would that affect user experience? i.e. sending users to a separate tab per round.
